author: Elaine Allaby
title: Pregnant Italians on virus-free island told to deliver elsewhere
description: Protests grow after maternity ward on Pantelleria, which is coronavirus-free, was closed.
content:
Rome, Italy - On Sicily's southernmost island of Pantelleria, 33-year-old Annalucia Cardillo was looking forward to the birth of her first child.
But in the past few weeks, for Cardillo and the seven other women on the island due to give birth in May, antici… [+3264 chars]
